name: My first game (MechMaster)
description:
This is my first game and it was made with the purpose of  learning the basics of 2d games in unity. It is very likely that this game will not be updated with new features, either way feel free to suggest anything you'd like to change or any feature you can think of that might be cool :)

Programmer: Me!

Music: Me!

Player death sound by:

luminousfridge  link for the sound HERE

Controls:

A and D or left and right arrows to move

Spacebar or Z to jump

X or H to attack

btw you can deflect big bullets
